mapper.sql: full_short_url, gid, date, cnt, device, create_time, update_time, del_flag
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_device_stats ( ) VALUES (#{linkDeviceStats.fullShortUrl}, #{linkDeviceStats.gid}, #{linkDeviceStats.date}, #{linkDeviceStats.cnt}, #{linkDeviceStats.device}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + #{linkDeviceStats.cnt}
mapper.select: SELECT device, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM t_link_device_stats WHERE full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{param.gid} AND date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{param.startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{param.endDate}, ' 23:59:59') GROUP BY device
